## Block.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Block` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(form: Form, name: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  form | [Form](./forms42core.form.md) | : The form to attach to |
|  name | string | : The name of the block, used for binding elements |
